description.intro: Who can help us learn our native language?! Definitely not Duolingo owl... In October 2022, we gathered a team of volunteers and started developing a mobile application to make it easier to learn our native language and switch to it in everyday life.
description.rules: Lessons are grouped by vocabulary topics: Family, Apartment, Shop, etc. Each lesson also has corresponding grammar rules.
description.practice: After each lesson, you can go through its exercises to check how well you learned the lesson.
description.prize: Get bonuses for completing exercises and daily practice without breaks.
description.competition: Every week you will be able to compete with other users of the app in collecting the most stars.
